summary: This document contains a transfer request from TD Ameritrade to Charles Schwab involving the account of Southern Financial LLC. It includes communication between Richard Kahn and TD Ameritrade regarding the transfer process and issues with the clarity of the submitted transfer form.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the account holder for Southern Financial LLC and is involved in the transfer request to Charles Schwab.

persons.name: Wade Heigh
persons.context: Wade Heigh is a Senior Account Manager at TD Ameritrade who communicates with Richard Kahn regarding the transfer request.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is a client of Wade Heigh, who is assisting him with the transfer of assets.

events.title: Transfer Request Submission
events.description: Richard Kahn submitted a request for asset transfer from TD Ameritrade to Charles Schwab.

events.title: Transfer Request Follow-Up
events.description: Wade Heigh follows up with Richard Kahn regarding the clarity of the transfer form submitted.

keyFacts: The document is a transfer request from TD Ameritrade to Charles Schwab for Southern Financial LLC.
Richard Kahn is the account holder involved in the transfer process.
Wade Heigh is the Senior Account Manager at TD Ameritrade handling the request.
There were issues with the clarity of the transfer form submitted by Richard Kahn.
The transfer request was initially submitted on May 14, 2019.
